data.text: Mangɛ fama nɛ mangɛya raɲɛrɛde tinxinyi ra,
Kankan luma nɛ alɔ banxi fanyi turunnaadɛ dinma naxan na,
Na tɛmui ya naxee se fenma, nee se igbɛma nɛ.
Xaxilitaree fama nɛ fahaamui sɔtɔde,
Mixi kobi mu xilima kuntigi,
barima e mu nɔndi falama, e mu fe fanyi maɲɔxunma.
Mixi ɲaaxi wali ki mu fan,
Kɔnɔ mixi fanyi tan a matoma nɛ a fe fanyi rabama ki naxɛ,
Banna ginɛe, wo xa wo tuli mati n xui ra.
Beenun ɲɛ keren xa dangi, wo sɛrɛnma nɛ gaaxui ra,
Banna ginɛe, wo xa wo magoro,
Wo xa wa wo xa wɛni bogi nun xɛ kanaxie xa fe ra.
Wo xa wa n ma ɲama xa bɔxi xa fe ra,
Wo xa yire makantaxi raboloma nɛ,
A luma na ki nɛ han Ala a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ragoroma won ma tɛmui naxɛ keli koore ma.
Sɛriyɛ raɲɛrɛma nɛ gbengberenyi ma,
Tinxinyi xa wali findima bɔɲɛsa nan na,
N ma ɲama luma nɛ naa bɔɲɛsa kui, maraxarɛ kui.
Hali fɔtɔnyi kana, taa bira,
hɛɛri nan luma wo bɛ,
